Description: Limestone ostracon containing a letter written in Coptic.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Henri Édouard Naville (1893-94, on behalf of EEF)
Bibliographic references: Paris 2000 / L'art copte en Égypte 2000 ans de christianisme: Exposition présentée à l’Institut du monde arabe, Paris (no.16, p.45)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (390570) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/390570)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2000 30 Sep-2001 7 Jan, France, La Clape, Musée de l’Ephebe, L’art copte en Egypte 2000 15 May-3 Sep, France, Paris, Institut du Monde Arabe, Coptic Art
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Crum 54 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
